# redstat

## Content

- [Description](#description)
- [Installation](#installation)
- [Usage](#usage)
    - [Get help](#get-help)
    - []

## Description

Redstat is a cli application for getting statistics from reddit (subreddit and user)

## Installation

```commandline
pip install redstat
```

## Usage

### Get help

```commandline
redstat -h
```

###
